line: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It’s not.
I meant what I said, and I said what I meant... An elephant’s faithful, one hundred per cent!
Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is You-er than You!
From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.
book: One Fish, Two Fish, Red Fish, Blue Fish

line: And will you succeed? Yes! You will, indeed! (98 and 3/4 percent guaranteed.)
